name: Infinity Fighter
description: A mini-game made for NYU's code lab class as a final submission.  Controls are W, A, S, D and left mouse button to shoot.  Escape to close out of application.  It's one simple level with one objective, destroy 50 enemy units.  It's a little challenging, but if you want to raise the bar, defeat 50 enemies with no power ups.  If you want to up the ante, defeat 50 enemies with no power ups and not letting a single enemy past you.  These self-imposed challenges can make things really fun :)
